Festivals: ['Glasgow International Film Festival 2022', 'Santa Barbara International Film Festival 2022']
Title: Home remedy for Gas ⚡️
Narrative:
It’s - Lemon juice and baking soda mixed into water 🍋

The juice from lemons mixed with baking soda creates carbon dioxide , which is great for digestion . This mix is great for bloating and flatulence and starts working immediately . Baking soda acts as an antacid , so it can help relieve gas . However , you want to be careful not to consume too much , as baking soda contains a large amount of sodium , which can be bad for body in excess . Adding 1/2 teaspoons on baking soda to water along with some lemon juice can go a long way for relief without leaving body vulnerable to possible negative side effects .
